Articles.Content:
Hello, happy new year.

As a gift to myself, ive bought ps3 two days ago. And i got a few games, too.

Thing is, none of my friends have ps3, they preffer sitting on pc, playing counterstrike go (i hate that game)

so, i dont have anybody to play with.

If you have ps3 and you play battlefield, fifa 12 (or gta 5, im going to buy it), give me your psn or invite me, my nick is TheScareCake.

I wonder if we could even create a group.

Cheers!

Sorry, i'm a member of the PC GAMING MASTER RACE.

Although i don't like CS:GO that much either.

Sorry, i'm a member of the PC GAMING MASTER RACE.

Although i don't like CS:GO that much either.

Me too. I just hate almost all modern shooters because they are unimaginative money grabs.

Well, i hate them too, but i have two exceptions, battlefield 4 (i kinda like that game on ps3, yet it's a shame that nobody in here plays with it)

And arma 2, the most realistic (not including realistic physics) military simulator.

Well, i hate them too, but i have two exceptions, battlefield 4 (i kinda like that game on ps3, yet it's a shame that nobody in here plays with it)

And arma 2, the most realistic (not including realistic physics) military simulator.

Battlefield is decent, because big maps and vehicles. Vehicles improve any shooter.
I've only played on my Grandmas... N64 I think? Mario kart and pokemon so here, total PCMR.
Well looks like I have to run for my life again for playing CoD

The only console I have is a Wii, which, to be honest, isn't all that bad, because there are indeed a lot of good Wii games out there. I really only play Xbox at my cousin's house where he has CoD WaW. Multiplayer is fun!
I do have a PS3, but it has been months since I turned it on.

yup, I have a PS3, but really I almost never play any games on it anymore. Last time I fired it up for actual gaming was during my last playthrough of Mass Effect 3. Don't have many games for it either.
